title: CAG: Railways lags in non-fare earnings, recovery of dues
description: Railways is losing out on significant non-fare revenue, with vast vacant land undeveloped and Rs 4,087 crore in dues from private siding owners unrecovered. Audits reveal weak monitoring and enforcement, with RLDA awarding only a fraction of entrusted land for development. Systemic issues and poor inter-agency coordination are hindering timely monetization and revenue realization.

Airbus plans cloud shift: Company moves away from AWS, Google, Microsoft
description: Airbus is reportedly planning to migrate sensitive workloads to a European cloud, moving away from Google and Microsoft services. The aerospace giant aims to ensure European control over its critical data and operations.

title: Maple Leafs fans on edge as Auston Matthews trade talks heat up
description: Maple Leafs captain Auston Matthews is facing scrutiny as his scoring has slowed. This has sparked discussions about his future with the team. title: Zuckerberg's 'highest-paid' employee is reportedly unhappy with his Boss - What he said
description: Meta's $14.8 billion investment in Scale AI and the integration of its CEO, Alexandr Wang, into a new "superintelligence" lab are reportedly facing internal friction. Wang allegedly finds Mark Zuckerberg's micromanagement "suffocating," while some staff question Wang's experience. This shift also clashes with Meta's open-source AI philosophy, leading to executive departures.
